name: Blacksmith Idle
description:
Welcome to Blacksmith Idle. A small project for GAM 355 by Justin Forkey.

In this game you play as a blacksmith. Get materials and start crafting some weapons to sell to the populace. Work your way into investing in some local miners to get you a steady supply of materials. From there start recruiting the locals to come and learn under your guided wing. Watch them grow from simple Apprentices to experienced Journeyman (and women). 

This game stands as a "prototype" or technical demo of the idea behind Blacksmith Idle. Although it may not look very pretty it runs fairly well and with some more effort (and a decent team) this could become a decent clicker.
